alleviate.name: Alleviate
alleviate.indications: Patients that request Alleviate infusion without contraindication.
alleviate.description: Alleviate is formulated for patients that want to avoid, reduce, or wipe out menstrual cramps, gastric discomfort, and help with general GI health.

athletic_recovery.name: Athletic Recovery
athletic_recovery.indications: Patients that request the Athletic Recovery infusion without contraindication.
athletic_recovery.description: Athletic Recovery is packed full of everything! Designed for athletes to replenish everything their body needs after a great workout or to pack full before you go to competition, Recovery will do it!

beautify.name: Beautify
beautify.indications: Patients that request the Beautify infusion without contraindication.
beautify.description: The Beautify infusion focuses on promoting the health of your skin, hair, and nails. This is especially helpful for patients who want the ultimate improvement in how they look and feel.

build_a_bag.name: Build - A - Bag
build_a_bag.indications: Patients that request the Build-A-Bag infusion without contraindication
build_a_bag.description: Build-A-Bag status has a huge impact on the body’s function. Even mild dehydration can reduce the body’s function by 3%. Ensuring good hydration helps keep your body functioning at optimal levels and helps protect your kidney function.

brainpower.name: Brainpower
brainpower.indications: Patients that request the Brainstorm infusion without contraindication.
brainpower.description: Brainpower was created to enhance daily cognition to help enhance everything from day-to-day tasks to higher level cognitive functions.

energize.name: Energize
energize.indications: Patients that request Energize infusion without contraindication.
energize.description: Need that boost to keep you going? The Energize infusion helps give you the boost of energy that you need to live life at the fullest, help burn fat, and stay healthy.

high_c_infusion.name: High-C Infusion
high_c_infusion.indications: Patients that request high dose Vitamin C infusion without contraindication.
cautions: High C infusion CANNOT receive any other Vitamin C
high_c_infusion.description: Vitamin C is necessary for the growth, development, and repair of all body tissues. It's involved in many body functions, including formation of collagen, absorption of iron, the immune system, wound healing, and the maintenance of cartilage, bones, and teeth. It can also aid the acutely ill by giving vitality to leukocytes. Also is a powerful antioxidant and energy booster.

ill_never_drink_again.name: #I’ll Never Drink Again
ill_never_drink_again.indications: Patients that request the “I’ll Never Drink Again” infusion without contraindication.
ill_never_drink_again.description: "#I'll Never Drink Again" is the quintessential hangover formula that will rejuvenate anyone's last night experience.

immunity.name: Immunity
immunity.indications: Patients that request the Immunity infusion without contraindication.
immunity.description: Immune support is excellent for anyone who wants to prevent illnesses such as the cold and flu, but also to help with recovery time if you do catch the cold or flu.

myers.name: Myers
myers.indications: Patients that request the Myer's Cocktail infusion without contraindication.
myers.description: Myer's Cocktail is great for the overall health and wellbeing of the guest. Specifically, Myer's Cocktail has been shown to help with headaches, muscle cramps, boost energy levels, allergies, depression, cold and flu, and much more!

myers_pro.name: Myers Pro
myers_pro.indications: Patients that request the Myer's Pro Cocktail infusion without contraindication.
myers_pro.description: Myer's Pro Cocktail is great for the overall health and wellbeing of the guest. Specifically, Myer's Pro Cocktail has been shown to help with headaches, muscle cramps, boost energy levels, allergies, depression, cold and flu, and much more!

nad_rejuvenate.name: NAD+ Rejuvenate
nad_rejuvenate.indications: Patients that request the NAD+ Rejuvenate without contraindication.
recommendations: There are two general administration recommendations for maximum benefits. First is to have a one-time infusion course that is between 4 to 5 days consecutively utilizing below dosages followed by maintenance infusions thereafter.
The second is to have weekly infusions with the same above doses for 5 weeks in a row followed by a rest phase.
Initial consultation must be completed before ordering the patient specific nutraceutical.
It is suggested that on that day they receive a Myers or "like" infusion to optimize the guest's nutritional status before NAD is administered to achieve max benefits.
Maintenance for any patient that received NAD in the last 12 months will be person dependent based on body habitus, lifestyle, and history of NAD use in the past.
If one of the loading phases is completed, general recommendation of NAD use thereafter should be administered no more than once a week.
People can feel differences with as little as one infusion.

pregame.name: Pregame
pregame.indications: Patients that request the Pregame infusion without contraindication.

supa_gluta.name: Supa Gluta
supa_gluta.indications: Patients that request this IV infusion without contraindication
cautions: NO Boosts may be mixed in the bag with Supa Gluta
supa_gluta.description: Potent antioxidant with the ability to boost immunity and energy along with aiding in the decrease of symptoms in many pulmonology, cardiac, and nervous system disorders

zen.name: Zen
zen.indications: Patients that request the Zen infusion without contraindication
zen.description: Can help support the body's ability to decrease anxiety and increase ability to relax

ascorbic_acid.name: Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C)
ascorbic_acid.indications: Patients that request the IV infusion boost without contraindication
cautions: Patients with renal stone history
Max Total Dose: Max total dosing includes all IV administration
20 mL (10,000mg) max for any boost. High C infusion is separate from this max
ascorbic_acid.description: Vitamin C is necessary for the growth, development, and repair of all body tissues. It's involved in many body functions, including formation of collagen, absorption of iron, the immune system, wound healing, and the maintenance of cartilage, bones, and teeth. It can also aid the acutely ill by giving vitality to leukocytes. Also is a powerful antioxidant and energy booster.

resources.name: Ascorbic acid metabolism and functions: A comparison of plants and mammals

hydroxocobolomin.name: B12 (Hydroxocobolomin)
hydroxocobolomin.indications: Patients that request the IV infusion boost without contraindication.
cautions: Max Total Dose: Max total dosing includes all IV administration
hydroxocobolomin.description: Reverses B12 deficiency and macrocytic anemia related to B12 deficiency. It helps to increase energy along with the ability to augment metabolism in weight management.

biotin.name: Biotin
biotin.indications: Patients that request the IV infusion boost without contraindication.
cautions: Max Total Dose: Max total dosing includes all IV administration
biotin.description: Helps in growth and regeneration of hair, nails, and skin. Also aids in breaking down fats and carbohydrates

booster_bag.name: Booster Bag
booster_bag.indications: Hydration boosters are for those patients who want an extra bag of Lactated Ringers solution after having a Nutraceutical infusion
booster_bag.description: This is intended to aid in the patient's overall hydration status. Gives the ability to boost energy through replenishment of isotonic fluids

frequency.maximum: 2 liters per day, 5 liters per 5 days

l_taurine.name: L-Taurine
l_taurine.indications: Patients that request the IV infusion boost without contraindication.
cautions: Max Total Dose: Max total dosing includes all IV administration
Max total dose: 500 mg
l_taurine.description: L-Taurine is an antioxidant that also helps to stabilize cell membranes. It is essential for cardiovascular, skeletal muscle recovery, retinal, and central nervous system development, and function.

magnesium_chloride.name: Magnesium Chloride
magnesium_chloride.indications: Patients that request the IV infusion without contraindication
contraindications: Individuals already taking daily magnesium supplement
cautions: This is separate from the Alleviate infusion
MAX Total Dose:  in any infusion is 1,200 mg
magnesium_chloride.description: This is an electrolyte that is essential for muscle function. Magnesium helps with smooth muscle relaxation including blood vessels and bronchi.

biamino_blend.name: Bi-Amino Blend
biamino_blend.indications: Patients that request the IV infusion boost without contraindication
cautions: Max Total Dose: Max total dosing includes all IV administration
Athletic Recovery, Energize, and Quick Slim Pro are the ONLY infusions that have 5 mL (500/500mg).
Independent from this infusion, the maximum allowed boost is 2 mL.
biamino_blend.description: Helps to decrease acute and chronic liver disease. It is also used for many other conditions and can be used to improve athletic performance, prevent fatigue, improve concentration, and reduce muscle breakdown during intense exercise

zinc_sulfate.name: Zinc Sulfate
zinc_sulfate.indications: Patients that request the IV infusion boost without contraindication
cautions: Max Total Dose: Max total dosing includes all IV administration
1 mL (10 mg)
zinc_sulfate.description: It is needed for the body's defensive (immune) system to properly work. It plays a role in cell division, cell growth, wound healing, and the breakdown of carbohydrates.

alpha_lipoic_acid.name: Alpha-Lipoic Acid (ALA)
alpha_lipoic_acid.indications: Patients that request the IV infusion boost without contraindication
alpha_lipoic_acid.contraindications: Thyroid Disorder with patients on Thyroid medication
cautions: Diabetic Patients
History of Hypoglycemia
Max Total Dose: Max total dosing includes all Slow IV Push (SIVP 10-20 seconds)
alpha_lipoic_acid.description: ALA is an antioxidant that helps with overall detoxification. In addition, ALA also helps to improve metabolic function, promotes weight loss, can help with nerve pain, and can help with blood sugar control.

glutathione.name: Glutathione
glutathione.indications: Patients that request this IV infusion boost without contraindication
cautions: Max Total Dose: Max total dosing includes all Slow IV Push (SIVP 10-20 seconds)
glutathione.description: Potent antioxidant with the ability to boost immunity and energy along with aiding in the decrease of symptoms in many pulmonology, cardiac, and nervous system disorders

toradol.name: Toradol (Ketorolac)
toradol.indications: Patients that request the IV infusion without contraindication
cautions: Significant Cardiac Disease
Blood thinners or other anti platelet medications
Max Total Dose: Max total dosing includes all Slow IV Push (SIVP 10-20 seconds)
toradol.description: This is an NSAID based medication that helps aid in a wide array of general muscle pain or arthritic pain. Also, can be utilized as a migraine/Headache abortive

zofran.name: Zofran (Ondansetron)
zofran.indications: Patients that request the IV injection without contraindication.
cautions: Max Total Dose: Max total dosing includes all Slow IV Push (SIVP 10-20 seconds)

coq10_im_injectable.description: CoQ10 is an essential antioxidant. It has the potential to help heart failure patients, Type II Diabetics with insulin resistance, hypertension, metabolic syndrome, and has the potential to decrease the prevalence of certain types of cancer and neurologic degenerative diseases

vitamin_d_im_injectable.indications: Patients that request this IM injectable without contraindication, or have a known and documented deficiency of Vitamin D
contraindications: Currently on daily oral regiment (any dose)

Results must be within 30 days and without Vitamin D treatment
frequency: Vitamin D Deficient: 7 days for 8-12 weeks

1mL(Methionine 15mg, Choline 50mg, L - Carnitine 50mg, Thiamine(B1) 15mg, Dexpanthenol 5 mg / ml)
